title: #465: The Energy Paradox and Ancient Civilizations With Randall Carlson and Graham Dunlop
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome returning champions, Randall Carlson and Graham Dunlop, to the show to discuss the evidence that the Earth's natural temperature cycle and how this helped ancient civilizations rise and fall! Thank you for your support.

For Tickets To Sam Tripoli Live Go To SamTripoli.com:
